content:
Hi — Nagarjun here. How can I help today? 

I work on cloud and IoT architectures, GenAI on enterprise data, and practical approaches to quantum for real systems. If you want, I can:
- Discuss a system design or architecture tradeoff
- Help think through a GenAI pilot (data, governance, evaluation)
- Talk about IoT platforms at scale or edge/cloud tradeoffs
- Give practical notes on early-stage quantum use cases
- Point to relevant posts or resources on my site

What are you curious about?
Nice to meet you, Arjun. How can I help today — anything you’re working on or curious about (cloud/IoT/GenAI/quantum or system design)?
Your name is Arjun. How can I help today?
